name: Impact (itch) (ItsKevin183)
description:
This is my first game I've ever made, this game is made in Unity mainly with the terrain editor and I had a ton of fun working on it. It's a fun little platformer meant for speedrunners. It contains 1 level divided into 3 checkpoints with a timer and a strafing mechanic.

Controls:

WASD = Movement 

Spacebar = Jump

R = Reset (Restarts the game/level so you can attempt a new run)

Esc = Pause Menu

Install guide:

1. Download the game/folder

2. Extract the folder

3. Enjoy!

Warning: 

0.5 is a stable version of Impact, while 0.59 is a test version of Impact that has a lot of bugs and is not fully done yet.
